main event: A UFO sighting was reported approximately 50 miles south of Albany, New York on March 16, 1965, involving four unidentified objects observed visually for about 5 seconds.
interesting points: The objects were described as falling flaming objects with unknown characteristics., The sighting was reported from a B-52 aircraft flying at 35,000 feet., The pilot thought the objects could be space debris or re-entering space vehicles., The sighting was part of an official Air Force investigation under Project Blue Book., Weather conditions included an undercast with westerly winds at approximately 135 knots.
sighted object: four unidentified flying objects in a trail formation
location: 50 Mi S of Albany, New York, US
witness description: The report features accounts from the pilot and co-pilot of the B-52 bomber.
